roleset.name: high volume
roleset.note: LOUD-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from loud.01-j)

role.descr: Thing that produces a lot of sound
Sound, message that is loud or loud about what?

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: Is that just the obligatory gesture to involve the Lib Dems , given they have always been very loud about Trident but very short on actual substance in stating what they would do ?

example.name: Arg 1 & 2
example.text: The message was loud to me.

roleset.name: tasteless, gaudy
roleset.note: LOUD-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from loud.02-j)

example.name: Single arg
example.text: His sports shirt was disgustingly loud.
